column2: Elendil is the father of Isildur and Anárion, a survivor of the Downfall of Númenor, and the founder and first High King of Arnor and Gondor. He is known as a great warrior, a wise king, and a heroic figure among the Dúnedain, who loves every man, woman and child of Arnor and Gondor, and is loved by them in return.
